Class HW3tests

java.lang.Object
HW3.HW3tests
public class HW3tests extends Object
JUnit test class for testing the Questions and Answers functionalities for this discussion board. This class contains automated tests for adding, updating, deleting, and searching for questions and answers.

Each test ensures that the application's question-answer system works as expected.

  • Constructor Details

    • HW3tests

      public HW3tests()

  • Method Details

    • setUp

      public void setUp()
      Sets up the test environment before each test runs. Initializes the question and answer managers.

    • testAddQuestion

      public void testAddQuestion()
      Tests whether a question can be successfully added. Verifies that the number of questions increases after adding a new question.

    • testAddAnswer

      public void testAddAnswer()
      Tests whether an answer can be successfully added to a question. Verifies that the number of answers for a specific question increases.

    • testSearchQuestion

      public void testSearchQuestion()
      Tests the search functionality for questions. Ensures that a search for "Java" returns at least one result.

    • testUpdateAnswer

      public void testUpdateAnswer()
      Tests updating an answer. Ensures that after updating an answer's text, the updated text is stored correctly.

    • testDeleteQuestion

      public void testDeleteQuestion()
      Tests the deletion of a question. Ensures that after deleting a question, the list of questions is empty.
